LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMaxOffset.label: neural heat limit offset
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMaxOffset.description: An offset applied to the user's neural heat limit.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRateOffset.label: neural heat recovery rate offset
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRateOffset.descrip: An offset applied to the user's neural heat recovery rate.
LanguageData.MeditationFocusGain.label: meditation psyfocus gain
LanguageData.MeditationFocusGain.description: The amount of psyfocus a person gains per day of meditation, ignoring bonuses from focus objects.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMax.label: neural heat limitneural heat limit
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyMax.description: The maximum amount of neural heat individual can tolerate safely.
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRate.label: neural heat recovery rate
LanguageData.PsychicEntropyRecoveryRate.description: The rate at which this person reduces neural heat.
LanguageData.EMPResistance.label: EMP resistance
LanguageData.EMPResistance.description: This mechanoid has special shielding and shock-dissipation filaments that reduce the effect of EMP damage by this percentage. This reduces the duration of stuns caused by EMP.
